overview: Sexy blond gamer Justin Matthews has no idea when he starts playing erotic game MEN BANG, starring all of his favorite Men.com studs, that the reward for winning the game is an IRL fuck-fest... until William Seed appears in his bed and tells him to fuck his ass! There's a lot more hotties he's got his eye on, like Dante Colle, Johnny Rapid, Beaux Banks, and Francois Sagat to name a few, and Justin levels up his in-game and real-life sexual skills as he points, clicks, and cums his way to victory, even earning a four-man orgy inside the game with Ryan Bones, Will Braun, and Damien Stone. Talk about a high score!
title: Men Bang!
